hints.text: Components are a feature in Boolean that allow you to save a selection of tiles to be used later in other puzzles or projects. To access this feature click the Components button to the right.
To create a new component, create a selection of floortiles and click on CREATE in the components window.
To spawn in a saved component, simply click LEFT MOUSE CLICK its name in the component window and click LEFT MOUSE CLICK again where you want to spawn it.
Click RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON or LEFT MOUSE BUTTON outside the grid to stop placing the component.
Components come with a simple overlay which shows its name. To show overlays, check the Overlay checkbox in the top corner.
